title: Bhutan Expands Digital Strategy With Solana-Based Gold Token
description: Bhutan has introduced TER, a sovereign digital asset backed entirely by the country’s physical gold reserves, marking a major step in its effort to blend traditional national wealth with modern blockchain infrastructure.

title: Satoshi Nakamoto Statue Arrives at NYSE as Wall Street Embraces Bitcoin
description: Twenty One Capital brought Bitcoin symbolism to Wall Street with a Satoshi Nakamoto statue installation at the NYSE, though the company's shares fell 19% on debut as markets digest Federal Reserve rate guidance and reduced 2026 cut expectations.

title: Terra (LUNA) Surges Over 55%: Here’s What’s Driving the Rally
description: Terra (LUNA) has emerged as one of the top gainers in the cryptocurrency market today, having recorded a strong double-digit price surge. The sharp rally coincides with the sentencing of founder Do Kwon, scheduled for today, and recent ecosystem updates that have drawn attention to the network. Why is Terra (LUNA) Token’s Price Surging? The altcoin began rallying late last week, with momentum accelerating on Monday following the v2. 18

title: Big Tech pours over $50 billion into India’s AI future in just one day

title: Top Three Altcoins That Might Benefit From the Fed Rate Cut
description: Key Insights: The Fed rate cut of 25 bps pushed the crypto market into a mixed mood. Bitcoin stayed weak because the cut was already priced in. When this happens, the top three altcoins that move differently from Bitcoin is likely to witness a boost

title:
The Federal Reserve cut interest rates by 25 basis points but signaled a potential pause in further reductions.

Bitcoin subsequently dipped below $90,000 as markets reassessed future monetary policy.

title: Ethereum (ETH) Price Ready for 9-16% Move amid Bullish Divergence, Buy the Dips?
description: Bullish divergence signals a potential 9-16% Ethereum price move as volatility returns after the Fed rate cut decision.

title: Raoul Pal Discusses Global Debt and Cryptocurrency Cycles at Solana Breakpoint
description: According to BlockBeats, Raoul Pal, former Goldman Sachs executive and co-founder of Real Vision, addressed the Solana Breakpoint conference, highlighting concerns about global debt and its implications for the economy. Pal noted that declining labor force participation indicates a shrinking workforce, which is a critical factor driving debt. He emphasized that as population growth continues to decline, the debt-to-GDP ratio will keep rising, posing significant challenges. Pal suggested that currency devaluation has historically been a method to address or delay the global debt issue

title: New CFTC License Marks Major Pivot for Gemini After Tough IPO
description: After years of stalled applications and prolonged regulatory review, Gemini has finally broken through: the company has obtained a Designated Contract Market license from the U. S. Commodity Futures Trading Commission, giving it the authority to run a federally regulated marketplace for event-based contracts

title: Bybit CEO Ben Zhou on perps, RWAs, and what’s next for 2026
description: Bybit CEO Ben Zhou talks about the challenges of building the exchange from a derivatives-first startup into a full-stack CEX.

title: Balaji Srinivasan Warns Indian Tech Professionals Against US Immigration
description: Former Coinbase CTO advises Indian tech workers to consider alternatives to U. S. immigration, highlighting opportunities in India, internet economy, and international markets. Balaji Srinivasan published a provocative social media post on X, urging Indian technologists to reconsider immigration to the United States

title: Binance Market Update: Crypto Market Trends | December 11, 2025

title: Norway decides not to pursue digital currency for now
description: Norway pauses CBDC plans, saying its current payment system remains secure and efficient. Central bank will keep studying retail and wholesale CBDCs as payment habits evolve. Norges Bank shifts focus to tokenisation tests while monitoring global digital-currency moves

title: Norway’s central bank says CBDC ‘not warranted,’ cites strong payment system
description: Norway rules that a digital krone is unnecessary for now, highlighting its strong payment rails and the uncertain benefits of both retail and wholesale CBDCs.
